lead_paragraph: The Microsoft co-founder said that stopping terrorism is in the public interest, but that government needs must be balanced with privacy safeguards.

headline.print_headline: Gates Says Government Must Find a Balance on Privacy and Safety
headline.main: Bill Gates Weighs In on Apple’s Clash With the F.B.I.

snippet: The Microsoft co-founder said that stopping terrorism is in the public interest, but that government needs must be balanced with privacy safeguards.
abstract: Billionaire philanthropist Bill Gates tells Financial Times that government must find balance between privacy and safety in compelling Silicon Valley to help with criminal investigations; newspaper paints Gates as siding with government to force Apple to unlock iPhone from San Bernardino gunman.
